tasks.label: Run Tests (testing-db container)
tasks.command: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f dev/docker-compose.prod.db-override.yml run --rm --build testing

tasks.label: Production Up
tasks.command: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f dev/docker-compose.prod.db-override.yml up --build prod

tasks.label: Production Down
tasks.command: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f dev/docker-compose.prod.db-override.yml stop prod && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f dev/docker-compose.prod.db-override.yml rm -f prod
